ITEM: Welcome to the ProFirst BIOS Manager.
Please select a way to open the OS.
(2) Enter ProID OS through developer mode.

HhT^Ph2Z~;@Vb#^RnnAr.text:
This is to make the cool
typing effect. It is defiantly more interesting than a normal say block.

O`nrT{)jU=a0(1]Q@q_%.text: Just to make sure the words from the say function are deleted shortly afterwards.

bHwoDPGv7@:pD*zMpz*].text:
The entire code is held within this function.

First, it checks if the user has used the project before. If he/she has, then ask for the password. Otherwise, get the user to create a password, then ask for the user to type it.

Secondly, if the entered password is correct, begin the program. Otherwise, ask for the password again. If the password is entered wrong too many times, ask for the user to reset it. If the user wants to reset it, ask for the new password, otherwise, ask for the original password once again.

QUESTION: What do you want your password to be:
Please enter your password associated with your account.
Would you like to reset your password? (Yes, No).

input0: Please use this feature at your convience.

MESSAGE: Welcome to ProID OS 2! The password setup prompt may begin.

bHwoDPGv7@:pD*zMpz*].text: The entire code is held within this function.First, it checks if the user has used the project before. If he/she has, then ask for the password. Otherwise, get the user to create a password, then ask for the user to type it.Secondly, if the entered password is correct, begin the program. Otherwise, ask for the password again. If the password is entered wrong too many times, ask for the user to reset it. If the user wants to reset it, ask for the new password, otherwise, ask for the original password once again.
